title: How to Make a Cheese Crisp

steps.headline: Gather your ingredients.
steps.description: You will need a flour tortilla, refried beans, cheddar/Monterrey Jack cheese, and a grater.

steps.headline: Preheat the oven.
steps.description: You will just need to put it on broil 2.

steps.headline: Place tinfoil over a cookie tray.
steps.description: Make sure most of it is covered, and if it hangs out the edges, tuck the foil over the bottom.

steps.headline: Grate your choice of cheese, about one cup, into a bowl.
steps.description: All types of cheese work. You can also mix different types of cheese.

steps.headline: Place the flour tortilla onto the cookie tray.
Open the can of refried beans, and with a spoon, spread enough beans to cover the whole tortilla.
steps.description: It should be about one centimeter thick.

steps.headline: Spread the cheese over the tortilla.
Place into the oven for about 5 minutes.
steps.description: Check the cheese crisp often to make sure it does not burn.

steps.headline: Take the cheese crisp out of the oven and let sit for one minute.
Place onto a plate and eat!
(Optional) You can also add sour cream or salsa to the top of the cheese crisp once out of the oven.

text: Gather your ingredients. You will need a flour tortilla, refried beans, cheddar/Monterrey Jack cheese, and a grater. Preheat the oven. You will just need to put it on broil 2. Place tinfoil over a cookie tray. Make sure most of it is covered, and if it hangs out the edges, tuck the foil over the bottom. Grate your choice of cheese, about one cup, into a bowl. All types of cheese work. You can also mix different types of cheese. Place the flour tortilla onto the cookie tray.  Open the can of refried beans, and with a spoon, spread enough beans to cover the whole tortilla. It should be about one centimeter thick. Spread the cheese over the tortilla.  Place into the oven for about 5 minutes. Check the cheese crisp often to make sure it does not burn. Take the cheese crisp out of the oven and let sit for one minute.  Place onto a plate and eat!  (Optional) You can also add sour cream or salsa to the top of the cheese crisp once out of the oven.
